title: Queue time....extremely long and lag during ban
body:
I have been playing Nexus Siege and ARAM these few days and I have noticed that the estimated time is always 2:30 however I keep having a total waiting time for every game over 30mins. and one time I literally waited 1 hour for a game. May I ask if anyone is having the same problem? or is it my computer problem or wt?

Also during ban fro the nexus mode, I have experienced 4 time of lagging on banning the champ and suddenly quit game because of the server then add us back in but we have lost all 3 banning chance, and it just lag the hell up. Could you please fix it please? I think is it not my computer problem as everyone have the same thing happen together
